pages.text: Some foods, like fruits, can be eaten raw without cooking.  But as a general rule most meats, fish, poultry and other animal products need to be cooked before they can be safely consumed. Different foods have different chances of negative effects eaten raw.

Many foods can be cooked in furnaces with a fuel source or by being placed manually onto a campfire. As you advance, you may figure out how to craft other utensils and blocks that let you create more complex gastronomic creations.
